Product Reviews

class reviews.models.Review(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Model representing a product review submitted by a user.

user

The user who submitted the review.

Type:

User

product

The product being reviewed.

Type:

Product

rating

Star rating given by the user (typically 1 to 5).

Type:

int

comment

Textual content of the review.

Type:

str

created_at

Timestamp when the review was created.

Type:

datetime

updated_at

Timestamp when the review was last updated.

Type:

datetime

exception DoesNotExist
exception MultipleObjectsReturned
reviews.views.product_reviews(request, product_id)[source]

Display product reviews.

Parameters:

  • request – HttpRequest object.

  • product_id – ID of the product.

Returns:

Rendered HTML page with product reviews.

reviews.views.add_review(request, product_id)[source]

Add a review for a product.

Parameters:

  • request – HttpRequest object.

  • product_id – ID of the product to review.

Returns:

Redirect or rendered HTML page to add review.

reviews.views.edit_review(request, review_id)[source]

Edit an existing review.

Parameters:

  • request – HttpRequest object.

  • review_id – ID of the review to edit.

Returns:

Redirect or rendered HTML page to edit review.

reviews.views.delete_review(request, review_id)[source]

Delete an existing review.

Parameters:

  • request – HttpRequest object.

  • review_id – ID of the review to delete.

Returns:

Redirect or rendered confirmation page.
